title: Design Thinking-Based Language Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: An environment enabling collaboration via smartphone apps and mobile-friendly content distribution.

learning_goals: Learners can resolve complex language problem situations using a 5-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Learners can collaboratively propose creative solutions to real-world language-related social issues (e.g., information confusion, value conflicts)
Learners can perform self-directed reflection and feedback at least three times during language problem-solving processes and derive improvement plans

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Collaboration Tools (Padlet, Google Docs Mobile Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
